document_data.name: Devil's Ride
document_data.mainbody: A '''Devil's Ride''' was a small one-creature [[infernal war machine]].
document_data.Description: A Devil's Ride had two wheels covered in spikes. It was controlled by two handlebars made from horns. Its large engine combined with its size meant it was maneuverable and fast. It had no weapons.
document_data.Abilities: If it reached a certain velocity, a Devil's Ride could jump a distance of {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}} over an obstacle. Despite its size, it carried up to {{SI|100|lb|k|long=yes}} in cargo.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Torogar Steelfist]], a [[minotaur]] who served in [[Avernus]] as [[Arkhan]]'s bodyguard.
* [[Smiler]], an [[eladrin]] that was once a leader of a warband in Avernus.
* [[Mad Maggie]], a [[night hag]], owned two Devil's Ride in her garage at [[Fort Knucklebone]].<ref>
* Could be smithed by engineers, Metal forgers and artificer.
